solution_line_template: For the night he was able to intake {cake_calories} + {chips_calories} + {coke_calories} = <<{cake_calories}+{chips_calories}+{coke_calories}={night_intake}>>{night_intake} calories
For breakfast and lunch, he was able to intake {breakfast_calories} + {lunch_calories} = <<{breakfast_calories}+{lunch_calories}={day_intake_breakfast_lunch}>>{day_intake_breakfast_lunch} calories
So, for the entire day Voldemort was able to intake {day_intake_breakfast_lunch} + {night_intake} = <<{day_intake_breakfast_lunch}+{night_intake}={total_daily_intake}>>{total_daily_intake} calories
Therefore, he can still intake {daily_limit} - {total_daily_intake} = <<{remaining_calories}={remaining_calories}>>{remaining_calories} calories.
